SELECT * FROM hippolog:item WHERE hippolog:eventUser<>'anonymous' AND hippolog:eventUser<>'workflowuser' AND hippolog:eventUser<>'system' AND hippolog:eventMethod<>'list' AND hippolog:eventMethod<>'getGalleryTypes' AND hippolog:eventMethod<>'archive' AND hippolog:eventMethod<>'logEvent' AND (hippolog:eventDocument<>'/collections' OR hippolog:eventDocument IS NULL) ORDER BY hippolog:timestamp DESC
